text: Ate uha alaha hi hai, jihara havavam nu apani kirapa nala age khusakhbari bana ke bhejada hai ate jadom uha hava bhare badalam nu utha laindi hai, tam asim usa nu kise khusaka zamina vala haka dide ham phira asim usa rahim pani utarade ham, pani rahi' hareka prakara de fala maida karade ham. Isa tar'ham asim muradi'am nu vi kadhage tam ki tusim citana karo
